title: Rage The Night Away (feat. Steve Aoki)
lyrics:
Rage, rage the night away
Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)
Rage, rage the night away
Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)
Rage, rage the night away
Forget about the money I spent today

Let's start the party with the money out the way

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today

You could save everything 'til you in the grave

Or ball 'til you fall, goin' all the way

Bricksquad



Make your money stack

Ayy

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Hey, hey, hey, hey

Hey, hey, hey

Flocka



Hangin' like apostrophes you can quote me

Throw the cake in your face like Steve Aoki (Bow)

We go hard in the paint cause she need to know me

Her body insane, man, she provoke me, like pow

I'm a need y'all to turn the fuck up now (Flocka)

I'm a need y'all to roll a blunt up now (Squad)

I'm a need y'all to fill yo' cups up now

Now I'm a need y'all to wild out, get down (You know)

Keep it on the low (Ayy), you a jump off girl, no Geronimo (Hahahaha)

At my condo, you know how it go

On the bed, on the couch and on the floor

On the floor (Bow), on the floor (Bow)

On the floor (Bow), get on the floor (Bow)

Don't step, make it back, that's all I know

Don't step, make it (Flex), throwin' all my dough

Bricksquad



Make your money stack

Ayy

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Flocka, Flocka

Hey, hey, hey, hey

Hey, hey, hey

Flocka



Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today

Let's start the party with the money out the way

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today (Flocka)

Rage, rage the night away

Forget about the money I spent today

You could save everything 'til you in the grave

Or ball 'til you fall, goin' all the way
